data.title: Rocking in Rockford
data.text: Great food, very uptown kind of feel.  I recommend making reservations as it does fill up fast when there is a concert in town.  The BMO Harris Center is within walking distance and there is a parking garage 1/2 a block away.

data.title: very good food
data.text: well prepared, tasty. a little pricey, but most good food is. friendly staff! i liked it. noisy and crowded on Friday night with a band.

data.title: great food and atmosphere
data.text: Octane has outstanding food selection in a hip artsy setting.  Friendly staff, but a bit slow during lunch rush, but a great evening place to take a date or friend.  They also have a great beer section.

data.title: Awesome Menu
data.text: Their menu is always amazing and so creative.  The tastes they put together are so original and unsuspecting, you can't wait for your next visit!

data.title: Much more than just a burger bar
data.text: I honestly feel that this restaurant does itselfs itself a disservice calingthemsrlvesa burger bar because theithey areway way way more than a burger bar the menu is always varied and highly delicious including Comfort Foods like loaded mac & cheese. always enjoyed a number of products here from coffee drinks before symphony to martinis after symphony and lots of delicious meals I would highly recommend it even though it doesn' infact look rather unassuming from the exterior. the waitstaff has always been more than appropriate and attentive

data.title: Don't be fooled by the modest, simple looking storefront-the food is amazing!
data.text: We walked in, by chance, before a show at the Coranado Theater with 45 minutes to eat. We were seated immediately and everyone was wonderful. The server Josh was really personable and great at his job. The food was amazing. Everything was fresh and tasted like it had been prepared with passion for food. The burger my boyfriend got had amazing grill flavor. My brie, butterkase, pear,  and fruit compote grilled cheese was SO good. We enjoyed a great dinner and made it in time for the 8pm show. Definetely make this a stop for dinner!

data.title: Thumbs up!
data.text: We have been visiting Octane for several years and have enjoyed our selections.  We have sampled a wide variety of the menu and its nice to see the menu change over the years with new additions.  The Saturday brunch is yummy and the service is generally spot on.  Thumbs up!

data.title: Give Josh a raise.
data.text:
Just had dinner with my girlfriend here. First time here. Food was awesome. We had the fried garbanzo beans with lemon curry. And nachos with chicken. And my gf had the twisted mac. And then we had the amazing cereal milk brulee.

But! I would like to see lucky charms cereal milk over corn flakes. Just sayin, cause ya know, lucky charms.

data.title: Great Find
data.text: Great little restaurant only two blocks from the Coronado theater and the BMO Center so a perfect location to get a creative tasty meal before a concert or sports event. Their flank steak and chocolate nachos are my go to choices. Sean at the door and Josh at the table make sure you have a great experience and are on time to your event.

data.title: Great combo with the Coranado
data.text: Great atmosphere minus the hair salon in the middle of the restaurant. Besides that the food and service was fantastic. I had the blue cheese burger.  There was no skimping on the blue cheese and garlic chips. Everyone at the table was happy with their selections. I followed my lunch with a turtle mocha, as a coffee lover this hit the spot!

data.title: Local owned restaurant
data.text: Interesting and varied menu. Not a chain place.  Excellent food.  Reasonable prices.  Friendly. Great place eat any time or before performance at Coronado.

data.title: Great gathering spot for dinner and ? Before the game!
data.text: Before a Rockford Ice Hogs hockey game we had 2 hours to kill and were hungry. We walked around and came across this little storefront establishment. And we're so glad we did! The only drawback is the seating capacity fills up quick! The food and service is great! The prices are very reasonable. We both had the chicken curry soup which was superb. I had the Ricky Ricardo sandwich and my wife had the Octane Burger. Both were very delicious! We'll definitely be back! I definitely recommend this place to anyone who is in the area.

data.title: Great fresh food and an awesome atmosphere
data.text: My friends and I eat here monthly. They have a seasonal, unique menu and I've never had anything I didn't love. Definitely recommended.

data.title: Drinks and Food
data.text:
This place has been around for a while. It's always been a decent place to grab some food. They have amazing bloody Mary's and the food is decent. The staff is rude and pushy with massive attitude problems.
The area above the entry way is disgusting, see my picture for details.

owner_response.author: keiji946, Manager at Octane InterLounge, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello Ryan, Please forgive us for the inconvenience we had caused, you may have very well caught us on our bad night/day just like any business we are prone to one of those.I assure you my staff is generally well behaved at their respective tables and would never be brash or aggressive towards our guests. I hope we can make it up to you on your next visit. -Patrick Alberto -Exec. Chef.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Service that goes above and beyond
data.text:
We've been to Octane several times, it's one of our favorite places in town. I haven't be disappointed by a meal, and the Ridgerunnner Quesadilla and Hawaii 5-0 Burrito are a couple of our go to items to order. Their Saturday brunch is amazing - awesome to take visiting friends to! But what really nudged me to write a review is the experience we had last night:
We were out for a date night, dinner and a show at the Coronado Performing Arts Center. Unbeknownst to our waiter, I was wearing a new dress. In true ladylike fashion, I managed to drip mango salsa on the front of my dress 4.5 seconds after our appetizer arrived. And then proceeded to try to clean up with napkins and cold water. Our waiter noticed my dilemma, and unbidden, dropped a glass of club soda and a clean towel at our table. The club soda got rid of any would-be stain and prevented a dash home in between dinner and the show for a change of clothes. 
The food is great, but the service really goes above and beyond.

data.title: Very unique menu and expereince
data.text: This place has a very unique menu, lots of choices not found on a chain restaurant menu.  Servers are very good and service was fast.  Has a hippie/modern feel.

data.title: Great little restaurant
data.text: The food here is absolutely amazing!  The chef should be complimented.  It's a great place for lunch during the week or for a cocktail and wifi in the evening.  I'm happy to see a successful venue on Rockford's west side.

data.title: Phenomenal
data.text: Over the years I've come to rely on Octane for excellent food, good ingredients, and a reasonable price. Octane becomes a habit if you're in the habit of eating quality, healthy food on a regular basis. Plus, the staff is very friendly and accommodating.

data.title: Really nice
data.text: I really like the place so much to try it again! Got the burrito and it was super delicious my husband got a hamburger and it was exquisite and it's because of the meat, so fresh and tastefully. We got the chocolate nachos to share, they were different and really good :)

data.title: A little taste of a Chicago-style bistro!
data.text:
Interesting and eclectic menu. Always fresh. Amazing wait staff. Innovative drinks and sodas. Wonderful local art. 
Always good!
